comments.comments_text: Goal! A great through ball by Kai Proger sets up Streli Mamba (Paderborn) inside the box, and he makes no mistake and bangs the ball into the bottom right corner. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: What a wonderful finish! Axel Witsel (Dortmund) latches on to an inch-perfect cross into the box and drills a low shot into the bottom right corner. There are not enough superlatives to describe that goal.
